arm_group.description: Fluor dental varnish (Fluor Protector, Ivoclar Vivadent, Principality of Liechtenstein)
Fluor dental varnish (Fluor Protector, Ivoclar Vivadent, Principality of Liechtenstein) plus 25% 50 nm silver nanoparticles.

brief_summary.textblock:
Patients with trisomy 21 are in greater danger of developing caries. It has been
      hypothesized that adding silver nanoparticles to fluor varnishes could promote
      remineralization of the teeth. A split-plot randomized controlled trial will be performed to
      address this question.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fluor Varnish With Silver Nanoparticles for Dental Remineralization in Patients With Trisomy 21

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with trisomy 21 diagnosed through caryotype

          -  Age 1 to 6 years old

          -  Any sex

          -  White spot present in both upper anterior teeth

          -  Parental agreement to participate in the study

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Hypersensibility to any of the substances used

          -  Non cooperating patients

          -  Caries in enamel or dentine in the upper anterior teeth

          -  Leukemia or diabetes

          -  Dental fluorosis present

intervention.description: Dental varnish will be applied to one anterior superior teeth in a random side.
Dental varnish with silver nanoparticles will be applied to one anterior superior teeth in a random side.
intervention.other_name: Fluor dental varnish with silver nanoparticles.

facility.name: Universidad Autónoma de San Luis Potosí

clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of the Addition of Silver Nanoparticles to a Fluor Varnish in the Remineralization of Temporary Teeth in Patients With Trisomy 21. Randomized Clinical Trial.

overall_official.affiliation: Universidad Autónoma de San Luis Potosí

authority: Mexico: National Council of Science and Technology
Mexico: Federal Commission for Protection Against Health Risks

primary_outcome.description: Remineralization status will be assessed through laser fluorescence of the tooth with a Diagnodent probe (Diagnodent, Kavo, Madrid, Spain)
